fields.Name: Flesheater (Melee Only)
fields.Description: +20 Attack Damage +10% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks build Flesh charges. After 5 basic attacks, the Flesheater active will be ready. UNIQUE Active - Flesheater: Rip the flesh from target enemy minion dealing 200 (+75% AD) true damage to the target, healing the user for 50 (+75% AD) health and adding 1 Flesh stack to the item. UNIQUE Passive: Each stack on Flesheater adds 1 AD to the wielder. ''No need to sharpen after use.''
